#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int num132[32],num3num2[65535];

long long mat[35],count3;

long long num1,num3;

char str[65583];

#define gc getchar_unlocked

void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}

void preprocess()
{
	mat[0]=1; mat[1]=2;
	for(int i=2;i<=35;i++)
		mat[i]=2*mat[i-1];
}

void find()
{
	int i;
	num1 = 0; num3 = 0;
	for(i=0;i<32;i++)
		num1+=(mat[31-i]*num132[i]);
	for(i=0;i<count3;i++)
		num3+=(mat[count3-1-i]*num3num2[i]);
}

int main()
{
	int t,i,len;
	int temp[50];
	int res;
	scanint(t);
	preprocess();
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",&str);
		for(i=0;i<=31;i++)
			num132[i] = ((str[i]=='1')?0:1);
		for(i=48,count3=0;str[i]!='\0';i++,count3++)
			num3num2[i-48] = ((str[i]=='1')?0:1);
		find();
		res = num3%num1;
		len=-1;
		i=0;
		while(res>0)
		{
			len++;
			temp[i]=res%2;
			res/=2;
			i++;
		}
		for(i=0;i<=len && i<32;i++)
			printf("%d",(temp[len-i]>0?0:1));
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
